actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the refund of excess duties deposited or paid before liquidation as a result of manifest clerical error.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to provide a refund, in appropriate cases, when excess duties have been paid due to manifest clerical error.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the refund of excess duties deposited or paid before liquidation as a result of manifest clerical error.
